Text: APQC on Knowledge ManagementAPQC on Knowledge Management is a monthly publication highlighting trends research and best practices in knowledge management KM Youre receiving this because our records indicate you have an interest in or responsibility for KM As communities of practice CoPs grow and change the roles of the individuals within them formalize These roles change as often as the communities do but several roles are integral to the initiation of a formal community Key Roles in the Success of Communities of Practice onkm Click on the link above to view this article If you have questions about knowledge management or would like information about APQCs KM products and services please visit or contact us at mailto American Productivity Quality Center Phone or Email Web SUBSCRIPTION SERVICES To change your email address or to subscribe to or unsubscribe from any of our newsletters please visit newsletters
